channel.title: forward-engineering on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in forward-engineering on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Forward Engineering 2024 - 2025
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: #tech discord highlights December 2024 and early February 2025 saw our #tech channel buzzing with diverse perspectives from our community.

item.title: Forward Engineering Quarter 3, 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, technology is our passion. We create it, study it, test it, document it, make it open source, and always striving to enhance it for the benefit of all.

item.title: Forward Engineering November 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Forward Engineering October 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we step into the exciting opportunities of October, we are at a crucial point in the ever-changing world of technology.

item.title: Forward Engineering August 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we step into the exciting opportunities of August, we are at a crucial point in the ever-changing world of technology.

item.title: Forward Engineering June 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we usher in the month of June, we embrace the ever-changing landscape of technological innovation, recognizing that every twist and turn propels us forward into a world of limitless possibilities.

item.title: Forward Engineering May 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The technological landscape is vast, brimming with opportunities for exploration and growth. As we stand on the brink of May, we pause to reflect on our journey thus far and chart our course forward.

item.title: Forward Engineering March 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At the intersection of technology and innovation, our engineering team at Dwarves Foundation has been driving change and pushing boundaries. As we continue to navigate the rapidly evolving landscape of software development, we remain steadfast in our commitment to seeking out the latest technologies and practices to deliver exceptional results.

item.title: Forward Engineering December 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.

item.title: Forward Engineering 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Learning at Dwarves? At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that learning is one of the most important aspects of any organization.

item.title: Dwarves Tech Radar Volume 03
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We started the 1st volume a year ago, mostly about assessing all the tech indexes we have adopted for 5 years.

item.title: Dwarves Tech Radar Volume 02
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Once every month, we gather for Radar update to round up the cool techs and assess if we should adopt that to the team.

item.title: Dwarves Tech Radar Volume 01
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Dwarves have their tradition to explore the tech scene and learn new things. Dwarves Tech Radar kicked the initial step since January of 2020.

item.title: Dwarves Tech Radar: The Introduction
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Perspective on Technology Technology is eating the world. The technology we used yesterday may be deprecated today. New technology has enabled us to create new things.
